---
title: "Setup"
---

## Install Quarto

Install Quarto and confirm:

```bash
quarto --version
```

## Python environment

From `research/`:

```bash
python -m venv .venv
# Windows: .venv\Scripts\activate
# macOS/Linux: source .venv/bin/activate

python -m pip install --upgrade pip
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

## Render & preview

Render a doc:

```bash
quarto render analysis/analysis-template.qmd
```

Preview with live reload:

```bash
quarto preview analysis/analysis-template.qmd
```

## Editor notes

- VS Code: install **Quarto** extension.
- Ensure your venv is activated in the integrated terminal if running Python chunks.
